class_notes:
Final Assessment: Scheduled In-Class Exam
This is a 1st year JD class. Graduate and transfer students that need to enroll should complete a 1L Required Course Form.
course_description: An introduction to alternative theories of property rights, the division of property rights over time (common law estates, landlord-tenant law), concurrent ownership, private land use controls (easements, covenants), and public land use controls (eminent domain, zoning).
